name: Angel!
description:
Angel!
Our love will last forever.

You're in heaven! Time to reconnect with your boyfriend. Talk to the other angels so they can point you in his direction. 😇

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look

Left click - Talk

CREDITS

Made in September 2021 for A Game By Its Cover 2021.

Based on "Angel!" by ACDH.

Writing and level design by Cathy Trang.

Art and code by Sean Wejebe.

(Well sometimes we did a little a bit of each other's things but mostly that's how it went down.)

Audio credits coming soon!

Mac and web builds coming soon? Hopefully!
